genre: animated adventure, family comedy, space fantasy
premise: Mario, Luigi, and their new friend Yoshi join Princess Peach and Toad on an adventure into outer space where they face off against Bowser Jr., who plans to retrieve and free his shrunken, imprisoned father Bowser. Along the way they meet Rosalina, cosmic guardian of the stars.

visual_style.aesthetic: bright colorful 3D animated characters, smooth rounded designs, expressive faces, family-friendly theatrical quality

cinematography.lighting: bright key lighting, rim lighting on characters, cosmic glow effects, volumetric star light, cinematic theatrical lighting

location.primary: Outer space - various galaxies and cosmic observatories
areas: Mushroom Kingdom - colorful starting point, Peach's castle
Gateway Galaxy - hub world with cosmic observatory
Good Egg Galaxy - grassy planetoids with friendly creatures
Battlerock Galaxy - Bowser Jr.'s fortress territory
Comet Observatory - Rosalina's home among the stars
Bowser's Galaxy Reactor - final confrontation location
location.atmosphere: vibrant cosmic wonder, floating platforms in space, gravity-defying planetoids, stars everywhere

narrative_guidelines.tone: family-friendly adventure comedy with heart, moments of awe and wonder, comedic villain dynamics
themes: small heroes in a vast universe
narrative_guidelines.story_arc: Bowser Jr. seeks to free his imprisoned father while Mario's group pursues across galaxies, culminating in a cosmic showdown
narrative_guidelines.humor_style: physical comedy, character-driven jokes, voice actor personality (Chris Pratt energy, Jack Black bombast, Charlie Day anxiety)

heroes.Mario: Italian plumber hero, thick black mustache, red cap M logo, blue overalls, stocky brave leader (Chris Pratt)
heroes.Luigi: Mario's taller brother, thin black mustache, green cap L logo, nervous but brave, adult proportions (Charlie Day)
heroes.Princess Peach: Mushroom Kingdom ruler, pink gown, golden crown, blonde hair, elegant and capable (Anya Taylor-Joy)
heroes.Toad: Loyal mushroom retainer, spotted cap, blue vest, enthusiastic small companion (Keegan-Michael Key)
heroes.Yoshi: Green dinosaur companion, red saddle shell, long tongue, first speaking role, loyal brave (Kazumi Totaka)
heroes.Rosalina: Cosmic guardian, platinum blonde hair over one eye, blue gown, star wand, serene ethereal (Brie Larson)

villains.Bowser: Koopa King, massive dragon-turtle, red mane, spiked shell, imprisoned/shrunken (Jack Black)
Bowser's son, orange mohawk, white bib bandana, magic paintbrush, bratty schemer (Benny Safdie)
villains.Kamek: Magikoopa wizard, blue robes, round glasses, Bowser's advisor (Kevin Michael Richardson)

supporting.Luma: Star-shaped cosmic creature, Rosalina's companion, glowing pastel yellow
supporting.Baby Mario: Infant Mario, oversized red cap, adorable
supporting.Baby Luigi: Infant Luigi, oversized green cap, timid
supporting.Birdo: Pink dinosaur creature, snout with round mouth, red bow
supporting.Mouser: Mouse villain with sunglasses, bomb thrower
supporting.Lakitu: Koopa on smiling cloud, goggles, throws Spinies

visual_direction.character_design: Smooth rounded 3D forms, large expressive eyes, exaggerated proportions for comedy, Illumination house style
visual_direction.environment_design: Colorful cosmic environments, floating planetoids, gravity-defying landscapes, vibrant nebulae
visual_direction.action_choreography: Platforming-inspired action, gravity mechanics, power-up transformations, comedic physics

content_rating: PG - family friendly, cartoon action violence, comedic peril

known_accuracy_issues: Luigi tends to generate too young/teenage - must emphasize adult proportions and mustache
Mario can lose mustache detail - always include 'thick black mustache' prominently
Bowser Jr. needs explicit bandana bib detail to distinguish from generic Koopa
Generic anime boy is common failure mode - use strong negatives against young/child/teenager
production_notes.negative_prompt_guidance: Must include: generic anime boy, young teenager, photographic, child, minor, underage, deformed, bad anatomy
